select * from ums_account_record left join ums_user u on u.id = account_record.user_id where 1 = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(account_record.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd') = DATE_FORMAT(queryParam.createTime,'yyyy-MM-dd')
and u.account = #{queryParam.account}
order by account_record.create_time desc
